overview: Dodo awakes at a sudden phone call and acknowledges the same with haste, but soon recognizes the voice and begins the conversation. The man on the other side of the call unintentionally nudges Dodo to question his decision of getting married ignoring his once true love. Suddenly, the phone disconnects leaving Dodo with a hodgepodge of emotions and regrets. As on date, the story comes back to a regular morning, where Dodo's wife Somdatta runs her efforts to wake Dodo up and reminds Dodo of the significance of that very day, 23rd September.
title: 23rd September
